text: Juris Kronbergs (9 August 1946 – 6 July 2020) was a Latvian-Swedish poet and translator. He was best known for his poetry, written in Latvian. His most known book is Vilks vienacis (Wolf One-Eye, 1996). He translated many volumes of poetry and fiction by Imants Ziedonis, Vizma Belševica, Knuts Skujenieks, Uldis Bērziņš, Sandra Kalniete, Jānis Elsbergs, Edvīns Raups, Inguna Jansone and other authors. Kronbergs died in Stockholm on 6 July 2020, aged 73.Pēc smagas slimības miris dzejnieks Juris Kronbergs ==References== ==Other websites== * Three poems Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Latvian poets Category:Swedish translators Category:Writers from Stockholm
title: Juris Kronbergs
